Text: Can definitely recommend this book! I read this years ago when it was released and hit NY Times best seller list. Really scary at just how prolific and virulent the Ebola virus is! Very scary!
That it is - also try BioHazard by Ken Alibeck.  Damnit.. now I'll have to find that one in Audiobook format haha.. give me a day or so?
Also check out Demon in the Freezer for another spooky read
